contentrichtext.text: '''American Beauty''' may refer to: * [[Rosa 'American Beauty']], a hybrid perpetual rose * [[American Beauty (album)|''American Beauty'' (album)]], a 1970 album by the Grateful Dead * [[American Beauty (film)|''American Beauty'' (film)]], a 1999 film starring Kevin Spacey and directed by Sam Mendes ** ''[[American Beauty: Original Motion Picture Score]]'', original score to the film ** [[American Beauty (soundtrack)|''American Beauty'' (soundtrack)]], a 1999 soundtrack to the film * [[American Beauty (Edna Ferber novel)|''American Beauty'' (Edna Ferber novel)]], a 1931 novel * [[American Beauty (Zoey Dean novel)|''American Beauty'' (Zoey Dean novel)]], a 2006 novel in the A-List series * [[American Beauty (1927 film)|''American Beauty'' (1927 film)]], a lost 1927 silent film romantic drama * ''American Beauty'', a regional brand of Italian [[pasta]] produced by [[New World Pasta]]. {{disambiguation}}
